name: Attacks
description: Attacks should not have their categories displayed.

name: Fire Spells
description: Fire spells are destructive in nature, with high damage and nasty debuffs.

name: Healing Spells
description: Healing spells provide an assortment of spells that restore health to your party whether over time or immediately.

name: Fighter Skills
description: Fighter skills provide various means of dealing damage and abilities that help you prolong a fight.
